query:
INSERT INTO account_tokens (index, index_per_token, token_address, contract_index, contract_sub_index, balance, token_id, account_index)
                    VALUES (
                        (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(index) + 1, 0) FROM account_tokens),
                        (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(index_per_token) + 1, 0) FROM account_tokens WHERE token_address = $1),  
                        $1, 
                        $2, 
                        $3,
                        $4, 
                        $5, 
                        $6
                    )
                    ON CONFLICT (token_address, account_index)
                    DO UPDATE SET balance = account_tokens.balance + EXCLUDED.balance
